author: lgo
msg: Merge changes trunk up to and including r1785.

author: lgo
msg: In the test suite, add an extra test for trust of CA/root CA certificates.
* test/server/serfrootcacert.pem: Certificates of the test CA and root CA.
(default_https_conn_setup): Declare here so that it can be called from
(ssl_server_cert_cb_expect_failures): ... this. Return ok only when there
test_serf_ssl_trust_rootca): New test, validates that server certifificate
is trusted when both CA and root CA are explicitly trusted.

author: lgo
msg: In the test suite, add an SSL test server + a basis SSL handshake test.
(replay): Use callback functions to write to socket.
test_setup_https_server): New function, initiate http and https server.
(test_start_server): Delegate the work of setting up a server to the new
(test_server_destroy): Cleanup the ssl part if needed.
(send_func_t, receive_func_t, handshake_func_t): New callback functions decls.
(struct serv_ctx_t): Moved from test_server.c. Add send, read & handshake
members for callback functions. Add ssl_ctx.
test_start_server): New and updated function declarations.
cleanup_ssl_context): New function declarations for the SSL server.
(*): New file, implements server-side SSL handshake and encrypt/decrypt.
(default_https_conn_setup): New, sets up te encrypt and decrypt ssl buckets.
(test_https_server_setup): New function, sets up an SSL server + SSL client.
test_server_proxy_setup): Adapt code to function declarations.
test_serf_ssl_handshake): New test for basis SSL handshake.

author: lgo
msg: Refactoring in the test suite code, move common code in separate functions.
(struct test_baton_t): Store the 3 arrays where we keep track of the sent,
(test_server_setup, test_server_proxy_setup): Pass # of reqs in setup() call.
create_new_request_with_resp_hdlr): New functions that create a context
test_serf_request_timeout): In all tests, use the new functions to create
requests. Use const int num_requests instead of #define. Update code that
uses 'counter arrays', as they are now stored in the test baton.
